page.title: 03Senior Citizens - Eastbourne
page.content:
The population of Eastbourne is approximately 79,000, an increase of 10% over the last decade.{About 36% {are over the age of 65.}There are at least 70 old people's homes in Eastbourne. 28% of people living in a private household are over the age of 65.
{THE DISTRICT GENERAL HOSPITAL. The hospital has 369 beds in 2 units. In Phase 2 of the hospital an extra 300 beds will be available - Medical, Coronary Care, Psychiatrics and Geriatric patients. The Outpatient Department treats 116,000 patients each year. There are 3 other hospitals in Eastbourne, All Saints, Princess Alice and St. Mary's.
